channel.title: CVE Feed for The Xorg Project -- xorg-x11-server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Xorg Project -- xorg-x11-server

item.title: CVE-2020-14347|2024-08-04T12:39:36.535Z -- the%20xorg%20project -- xorg-x11-server
item.description: A flaw was found in the way xserver memory was not properly initialized. This could leak parts of server memory to the X client. In cases where Xorg server runs with elevated privileges, this could result in possible ASLR bypass. Xorg-server before version 1.20.9 is vulnerable.
